price: តើអ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)មិនបានឃើញទេឬថា ម្ចាស់របស់អ្នក បានធ្វើទៅលើក្រុមទ័ពដំរីយ៉ាងដូចមេ្ដច ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
